title: Lang Co Fishing Village - Find peace in your soul
text:
18, 2015 
Lang Co Fishing Village is a poetic village at the bottom of Bach Ma Mountain in Hue, Vietnam. It is one of the most visiting attractions in Hue. Lang Co was honored as one of the best bays in the world by World Bays Club in 2009 
“Googling” Lang Co Fishing Village , the result will show your a fishing village belongs to Hue, but is located quite near Da Nang City, about 38km. A romantic and picturesque scenery appears in front of your eyes after passing through Hai Van Pass. It is said that Lang Co just came into being in the period of French occupation. Previously, Lang Co Fishing Village is An Cu Fishing Village. An Cu (An C°) in French language is L’Anco, and then it is called Lang Co (Lng Cô). Having existed for over 250 years, Lang Co Fishing Village is an ideal place to find peace in mind. 
The best way to get to Lang Co is taking a taxi from Da Nang International Airport. It costs about 450,000 VND inclusive of tolls and airport exit fees. Otherwise, you can travel by private car service from Da Nang or Hue. Da Nang International Airport is a popular destinations of many Vietnam domestic flights and international flights. To seek cheap flights to Da Nang or Hue, easily access AloTrip website to find the best one. 
As one of famous attractions in Hue , Lang Co Beach is as beautiful as a lady with a “sexy” back. Lang Co Fishing Village is surrounded by both majestic mountains and vast sea. Here is the residence of kindhearted fishermen. On autumn days, Lang Co is covered by a murky haze, while in summer it is featured with starry skies and cool wind. Tourists will be lured into a dreaming and fairy land. In Vietnam tour packages to Lang Co, tourists will not just be put in sight of sentimental seascapes, but also have chances to enjoy various unique local seafood which can be bought as gifts for family and friends after the trip to Hue . In the Lang Co Beach Village, there is a number of beach shacks are set up during the summer months (April-Sept) near the bridge/tunnel end of Lang Co beach. After exploring unique features of the fishing village, it is the time to visit Lang Co Springs. Lang Co Springs was previously just used by locals as access was limited before the new road was constructed around the lagoon. A road is currently being constructed, and a parking area is under construction. 
In addition, it will be a deficiency if Lang Co Bay is not mentioned here. It has long been renowned as a beach with the best natural conditions and the most beautiful scenery in Vietnam. White sand stretching more than 10 km, the immense blue seawater, and the vast tropical forests, mysterious Lap An Lagoon, Lang Co strongly attracts to any tourists. With such favorable conditions, Lang Co fishing village and Lang Co Bay gradually transform into the unique Lang Co tourist area. The tourist area is suitable for many different types of tourism, such as ecotourism, adventure tourism and relaxation tourist. 
Lang Co is expected to become one of ideal destinations in Vietnam in general and Hue attractions in particular, along with ecological complex of Lang Co – Bach Ma – Canh Duong. Todays, when mentioning to Lang Co, it is thought that here is a famous tourist and resort area. Yet, there is also another Lang Co, serene and peaceful with clean small alleys and hamlets, which imprints in tourists’ mind deeply.
